verses.plain: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.

tokens.t: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the

verses.plain: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.

tokens.t: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.

verses.plain: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:

tokens.t: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:

verses.plain: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.

tokens.t: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the
, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the

verses.plain: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.

tokens.t: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.

verses.plain: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.

tokens.t: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.

verses.plain: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
For my brethren and companions’ sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.

tokens.t: For my brethren and companions’ sakes, I will now say, Peace

verses.plain: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.

tokens.t: Because of the house of the
our God I will seek thy good.
